name: Wrande
description:
Wave  shooter

Controls:

Keyboard

  • WASD -  Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left click - Left weapon
  • Right click - Right weapon
  • R - Reset

Gamepad

  • Left stick - Move
  • Right stick - Aim
  • Left trigger - Left  weapon
  • Right trigger - right weapon
  • Select  - Reset
